publicationStmt.authority: Casting Digital Nets: Fishery Modeling, Native Dispossession, and Dynamic History on the Great Plains

body.head: A Booster
body.p: As a booster for Charles Mix county Editor Tucker is always there and never lets an opportunity pass to say a good word for one of the best counties in the state. Following is what he had to say last week about the fish in the lake:

quote.p: "It is not so strange after all that the largest bullheads and the finest bass known to men are to be found in the waters of Lake Andes, when we consider that this splendid body of water is located in Charles Mix, the county that produces the largest, the prettiest and the best of all that makes for the happiness and welfare of mankind."
